title: My First Blog Post
subtitle: Learning Flask
body: Flask is a lightweight WSGI web application framework in Python. It's easy to learn and great for beginners.

title: Another Post
subtitle: About APIs
body: APIs allow applications to communicate with each other, making data integration and automation possible.

title: Python Tips
subtitle: Make Your Code Cleaner
body: Use list comprehensions, f-strings, and functions to keep your code readable and concise.

title: Web Development Basics
subtitle: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
body: HTML structures the page, CSS styles it, and JavaScript makes it interactive.

title: Databases 101
subtitle: SQL and NoSQL
body: SQL databases are structured and use tables. NoSQL databases are flexible and store unstructured data.

title: Debugging Like a Pro
subtitle: Find and Fix Bugs
body: Use print statements, logging, and debuggers like pdb to troubleshoot your Python programs.

title: REST API Basics
subtitle: HTTP Methods Explained
body: GET retrieves data, POST creates new data, PUT updates data, and DELETE removes data.

title: Version Control
subtitle: Why Git is Essential
body: Git tracks changes to your code and allows you to collaborate with others without overwriting work.

title: Docker for Beginners
subtitle: Containerize Your Apps
body: Docker packages your application and dependencies into a container so it runs anywhere.

title: Deploying to the Web
subtitle: From Local to Live
body: Services like Heroku, Render, and Railway make it easy to host your Python web applications.
